page.title: 12Religion
page.content: Rector McDougall is rector in six parishes. He has been appointed as "rural dean" for five years. He is an archdeacon who is in turn under the area Bishop;the Bishop of Sherborne (the Bishop of Dorset )although Tollard Royal is in Wiltshire. He is in the diocese of the Bishop of Salis _bury. We are concerned with the parish of Tollard Royal which has about 100 people in it. He performs one service every week on Sunday ans visits hospitals and old people's homes (he also does funerals and baptisms). He has some people to help him in the church such as:church wardens, the church Treasurer,church secretary and a retired clergy man. The main religion of the area is anglican. {(AUTHOR:D.Koe)
